org.sbrubbles.conditio.AbortException

  • Packages that use AbortException 
    Package Description
    org.sbrubbles.conditio
    Holds an implementation of a simple condition system.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Handler.Decision Handler.Operations.abort()
      Aborts execution and unwinds the stack.
      default void Scope.notify(Condition condition, Restart<?>... restarts)
      Signals a condition which may go unhandled and returns no useful value.
      default <T> T Scope.raise(Condition condition, Class<T> returnType, Restart<? extends T>... restarts)
      Signals a condition that must be handled and return a result.
      <T> T Scope.signal(Condition condition, Policies<T> policies, Restart<? extends T>... restarts)
      Signals a situation which the currently running code doesn't know how to deal with.
